lead_paragraph: THE CATHOLICS AND THE HIGHER LAW.--The Tribune charges the American Catholics with opposition to "Higher Law" doctrines, respecting the recapture of Fugitives from Slavery," How far this is true we are not prepared to say. Our impression is, however, that American Catholicism differs in no wise, unless its name be a bull, from Catholicism everywhere also.
